message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's worth every penny, but I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is the best I can do for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I've already compromised significantly. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $1025000. This is my final offer, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
